Author: ashamedhuman1234566
Text: That's how I also feel. It drives me insane knowing I'm chasing something I will never have, and I'll just forever be completely mediocre and never actually considered more than that.

Author: fourteencarrots
Text: OP you might not find this helpful, but still thiught i'd share what has worked for me.    - experimenting with makeup, hair styling, and body modification. i focus more on the art and jewelry i've put on ny face/body rather than my facial features themselves  - accepting that i'm ugly. i'm actually not ugly, i have a very conventionaly attractive face, but after years of binge eating disorder, it's made me look completely different. i see my new ugly face as a way to shield myself from further heartbreak as most people tend to ignore me now.
